spec_data.Name: php-zendframework-zend-eventmanager
spec_data.Description:
The Zend\EventManager is a component designed for the following use cases:

    Implementing simple subject/observer patterns.
    Implementing Aspect-Oriented designs.
    Implementing event-driven architectures.

The basic architecture allows you to attach and detach listeners to named
events, both on a per-instance basis as well as via shared collections;
trigger events; and interrupt execution of listeners.

Documentation: https://zendframework.github.io/zend-eventmanager/
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:20:02 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Trigger and listen to events within a PHP application
